list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add new configuration files for bank modules
The commit introduces new configuration files for account, card, and loan modules in the config server. They are specified for each environment: prod, QA, and local. Additionally, updates have been done on application.yml to specify the location of these files. Also included are modifications in .idea/compiler.xml and .idea/workspace.xml files.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Database detector": "Database detector", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Database detector": "true", "RequestMappingsPanelOrder0": "0", "RequestMappingsPanelOrder1": "1", "RequestMappingsPanelWidth0": "75", "RequestMappingsPanelWidth1": "75", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "Spring Boot.AccountsApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.CardsApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.ConfigServerApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.ConfigserverApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.LoansApplication.executor": "Debug", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/DELL/Desktop/UdemyMicroservices/microservices/section4/spingboot-v2/configserver/src/main/resources/config", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "project.structure.last.edited": "Project", "project.structure.proportion": "0.0", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.2", "run.configurations.included.in.services": "true", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "spring", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Update project configurations and add new module
The project configurations have been updated by deleting irrelevant files and updating the project's .iml file. In addition, a new module called 'configserver' has been introduced; its source code uses the "UTF-8" character encoding, related options have been added to the compiler's additional options, and pom.xml file is included in the module settings. Finally, a new banner.txt file has been added to the configserver module.

Add ConfigServer application
Created a new Spring Boot application named ConfigServer. The application includes a new .gitignore file, an application configuration file, a main application class, and a test class. Generated necessary files to handle the project dependencies, including pom.xml and Maven Wrappers.

Add new configuration files for bank modules
The commit introduces new configuration files for account, card, and loan modules in the config server. They are specified for each environment: prod, QA, and local. Additionally, updates have been done on application.yml to specify the location of these files. Also included are modifications in .idea/compiler.xml and .idea/workspace.xml files.
